title: Shady Or Not: He Texts Other Women During Their Dates?!
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
She's only gone on two dates with thig guy, and she considering kicking him to the curb. During their dates, he openly makes plans with another woman.
She has no idea what type of relationship he has with this woman. Should she ask him or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
